instruction: Describe the key features of the latest version of the iPhone.
output: The latest version of the iPhone has several key features that make it stand out. It has a larger, 6.5-inch Super Retina XDR display which offers improved viewing for games, videos, and movies. It is also powered by an A13 Bionic chip, enabling faster app performance. The device is equipped with a dual-camera system, allowing for sharper and more detailed photos. Additionally, the phone boasts improved water-resistance, wireless charging capability, and Face ID for fast and secure authentication.
